author: tersec
content: are there the usual monitoring tools up for Ropsten? (blockcha.in, transaction explorer, etc)

author: jgm
content:
For the execution side there is https://ropsten.etherscan.io/

Consensus side there is https://beaconchain.ropsten.ethdevops.io/ and I believe a more official explorer coming soon.

author: parithosh

Yea sorry, they got too routine to make writeups about ðŸ˜„ 

Like Marius said, just some small issues we'd still need sorted out. Mainly relating to some proposals timing out and including 0 tx's (but still proposing) + some issues with certain erigon-cl combinations.
